summary.one_sentence: A detailed tutorial demonstrating a flexible, controlled method to run Docker apps on TrueNAS Scale using standard Docker tools integrated seamlessly with TrueNAS.
summary.detailed: The video explains three common methods to run Docker apps on TrueNAS Scale, highlighting their limitations, then introduces a preferred approach using Docker Compose files integrated with TrueNAS for better flexibility and control. It walks through three practical examples—Draw IO, NGINX, and Code Server—showing step-by-step setup, volume mapping, permissions, and live editing via a browser-based code editor. The creator emphasizes ease of management, version control, and maintaining the TrueNAS app experience, concluding with an invitation for community feedback and engagement.
